decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bring them back into play for a game-winning combo. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage while Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty offer additional threats and abilities. The deck aims to efficiently reanimate creatures while controlling the game with counterspells and disruption from cards like Thoughtseize and Wasteland.

This deck focuses on utilizing cheap spells to control the board and pressure the opponent with aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counter spells like Force of Will and Daze while also digging through the deck with cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck also includes artifact spells like Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Bauble for additional card advantage and synergies with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The mana base includes fetch lands like Flooded Strand and Wasteland to ensure consistent access to the right colors of mana.

The key concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Combo - Nadu deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Noble Hierarch and efficient land fetching, while protecting the combo pieces with counterspells like Force of Will. The deck aims to utilize the synergy between Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Shaman en-Kor to generate massive card advantage and control the board. Delighted Halfling and Plagon, Lord of the Beach provide additional support and backup win conditions. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Teferi, Time Raveler offer card draw and disruption to further enhance the deck's strategy.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures, such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, using cards like Entomb and Reanimate. The deck also includes protection spells like Force of Will and Daze to ensure the combo goes off smoothly. By utilizing powerful reanimation spells and disruptive elements, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with strong creatures early in the game and dominate the battlefield. Additionally, cards like Brainstorm and Ponder help to filter through the deck and find the necessary pieces to execute the combo effectively.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by countering and removing threats while generating card advantage through card draw and recursion. It utilizes a mix of counter spells, removal spells, and card selection/filtering to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the board. The deck also includes threats that can provide additional card advantage or pressure the opponent, allowing the pilot to stay ahead in the resource battle. Overall, the deck aims to dominate the game through efficient control and strategic decision-making.

The deck focuses on assembling a combo using Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's deck. It also includes support cards like Goblin Welder and Goblin Engineer to aid in finding the combo pieces quickly. Agatha's Soul Cauldron, Fable of the Mirror-Breaker, and Chaos Defiler provide additional win conditions. The deck aims to control the game with cards like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast while utilizing fast mana cards like Ancient Tomb and Simian Spirit Guide to speed up the combo. The inclusion of Urza's Saga helps to tutor for key artifacts.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures through cards like Entomb and Reanimate, allowing for explosive plays by bringing them back into play for a low cost. Utilizing disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo, along with cards like Brainstorm and Ponder for card selection, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent. With a mix of control elements and powerful reanimation targets, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to respond.

Utilizing a combination of graveyard manipulation, powerful creatures, and disruption spells, this deck aims to quickly reanimate big threats like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent while protecting the combo with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The inclusion of cards like Entomb and Reanimate allow for fast and consistent cheating of creatures into play, overwhelming opponents with massive threats. The deck also utilizes cards like Brainstorm and Ponder to filter through the deck and find the necessary combo pieces, making it a potent and efficient reanimator strategy in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts and aggressive creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It includes cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Patchwork Automaton to generate value from artifacts in the graveyard. Chalice of the Void disrupts the opponent's game plan while cards like Aether Spellbomb and Urza's Saga provide additional utility and value. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence early in the game and maintain pressure through efficient and versatile artifact-based threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo of Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Nomads en-Kor to create a powerful engine that can generate a large number of tokens and card advantage quickly. The deck includes ways to tutor for key pieces such as Chord of Calling and Green Sun's Zenith, while also providing protection and ramp with cards like Endurance and Noble Hierarch. The mana base is designed to support the combo while also allowing for flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the strategy revolves around assembling the combo pieces and overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of creatures.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Scythecat Cub and Wight of the Reliquary to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Snuff Out to control the opponent's resources. The deck is built around the Maverick archetype, which combines aggressive creatures with disruptive elements to create a versatile and powerful strategy. By efficiently using mana acceleration from cards like Ignoble Hierarch and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck aims to quickly establish board presence and pressure the opponent into making suboptimal plays.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize powerful aggressive creatures like Death's Shadow and Cecil, Dark Knight, coupled with disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to control the game early on. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent quickly while also disrupting their game plan effectively. It also utilizes cards like Brainstorm and Ponder for card selection and consistency. The deck's mana base is designed to support its aggressive game plan while also providing enough disruption with Wasteland and other land destruction cards.

This combo deck aims to quickly ramp up mana using lands like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors to cast big creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Apex Devastator. The deck also utilizes cards like Throes of Chaos and Creative Technique to cheat out these big threats from the deck. Additionally, Tibalt's Trickery is used to counter opponent's spells and potentially cast these big creatures for free. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and finish the game quickly before the opponent has a chance to respond.

The deck focuses on quickly putting powerful creatures into the graveyard, then using reanimation spells like "Reanimate" and "Animate Dead" to bring them back onto the battlefield for a powerful advantage. The deck also includes cards like "Thoughtseize" and "Force of Will" to protect its combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The aim is to overwhelm the opponent with early threats and efficient disruption, while utilizing the powerful abilities of creatures like "Archon of Cruelty" and "Atraxa, Grand Unifier" to secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with key creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back into play for a powerful early advantage. It also includes disruption elements like Force of Will and Thoughtseize to protect the combo pieces. The mana base is optimized for consistency with fetch lands and dual lands. Overall, the deck aims to combo off and overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Archon of Cruelty or Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while maintaining control over the game with counterspells and removal.

The main concept of this deck is to control your opponent's resources and disrupt their strategy using cards like Stifle, Torpor Orb, and Urza's Saga. The goal is to stifle your opponent's plays while preventing them from gaining an advantage. By using cards like Brainstorm, Force of Will, and Wasteland, you can manipulate your hand and disrupt their plans. The addition of Ancient Tomb and Lotus Petal allows you to quickly cast your spells and stay ahead in the game. Overall, this deck focuses on denying your opponent's strategy and maintaining control of the game.
